titleStmt.title: Some remarks upon the Anabaptist answer (sold by John Harris) to the Athenian mercuries: and some upon his answer, who styles himself Philalethes Pasiphilus.
titleStmt.author: Firmin, Giles, 1614-1697.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Lawrence at the Angel in the Poultrey.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Toronto Library.
